name: CAD Engineer/EDA Developer
description:
Fully remote work is available.

Job Description

The Custom Structured ASIC Engineering Group (eASIC) Team within Intel’s Programmable Solutions Group (PSG) is looking for a Software Engineer.

In this position candidate develops and applies computer aided design (CAD) software engineering methods, theories and research techniques in the investigation and solution of technical problems arising in Structured ASIC design. Assessing architecture and hardware limitations, plans technical projects in the design and development of CAD software. Defines and selects new approaches and implementation of CAD software engineering applications and design specifications and parameters. Develops routines and utility programs. Prepares design specifications, analysis and recommendations for presentation and approval. May specify materials, equipment and supplies required for completion of projects and may evaluate vendor capabilities to provide required products or services.

Ideal candidate should have a deep experience in the Static Timing Analysis and/or logical synthesis areas.

Qualifications:

  • C++ and scripting languages programming in CAD area.
  • BS or MS in Mathematics, Computer Science or electrical engineering.
  • BS + 5 years of relevant experience or MS + 3 years.
  • Ability to communicate well in English.

Qualifications and experience in at least one of areas:

  • Static Timing Analysis.
  • Timing optimization, placement and routing for ASIC and FPGA.
  • Logical synthesis.
  • Formal verification.
  • Open Access Data Base.
